text: Rashid Khan Arman (Pashto: راشد خان ارمان; born 20 September 1998) is an Afghan international cricketer and captain of the Afghanistan national team in T20I format. He bowls right-arm leg spin and bats as a right-handed batsman. Rashid is considered as one of the greatest 20 bowlers ever. As of October 2023, Rashid is ranked No. 1 in T20I and No. 6 in ODI cricket. He considers Shahid Afridi as his bowling idol. He was awarded ICC Associate Cricketer of the Year in 2017. In 2018, at the age of 19, he became the youngest cricketer to top the ICC ODI bowling rankings. Later, in december 2020, Khan was named the ICC Men's T20I Player of the Decade. ==References== ==Other websites== * Rashid Khan from Cricbuzz Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Afghan refugees Category:Afghan sportspeople Category:Afghan cricketers Category:21st-century Afghan people
title: Rashid Khan
